23. What is discharged at the cathode during the 
electrolysis of copper (ll) tetraoxosulphate (Vl) solution? 
A. Cu2+ only B. H+ only 
C. Cu  and H+ D. Cu2+ and SO2- 
 
24. An element, Z forms an anion whose formula is 
[Z(CN) ]y. If has an oxidation number of +2, what is the 
value of y? 
A. -2 B. 3 
and –396 kJ respectively. Calculate the molar heat of 
formation of ethane in kJ. 
A. -2792 B. +2792 
C. –64 D. +64 
 
28. CO(g) + H2O CO2(g) + H2(g)  H = -41000 J. Which 
of  the  following  factors  favour  the  formation  of 
hydrogen in the above reaction? I high pressure II low 
pressure III high temperature IV use of excess steam 
C. –4 D. –5 A. I, III, and IV B. III only 
    C. II, III and I D. Iv only. 
25. Which of the reaction is NOT an example of a redox 
reaction? 
I Fe + 2Ag +        Fe2+ + 2Ag+ 
II 2H2S + SO2  2H2O + 3S 
III N2 + O2 2NO 
IV CaCO3 CaO + CO2

phase of a substance . What part of the curve shows 
solid and liquid in equilibrium? 
A. T B. U 
C. X D. Y

 C2H4 2CO2 + 2H2O;  H = -1428 kJ. If the molar heats

33. Gunpowder  is  made  from  charcoal,  sulphur  and  
potassium  trioxonirate  (V).  The salt  in  the mixture 
   performs the function of 
A. an oxidant B. a reductant 
C. a solvent D. a catalyst 
A. I, II, III B. II and III 
C. III and IV D. IV only.
